Complex Mixtures/Biological Products/Vaccines/Toxoids/Tetanus Toxoid/Diphtheria-Tetanus-acellular Pertussis Vaccines
Record.Description: Combined vaccines consisting of DIPHTHERIA TOXOID; TETANUS TOXOID; and an acellular form of PERTUSSIS VACCINE. At least five different purified antigens of B. pertussis have been used in various combinations in these vaccines.
